To connect to our database:

```{r}
library(RPostgreSQL)
drv <- dbDriver("PostgreSQL")
spdb <- dbConnect(
   drv,
   host = "jh-redshift.socialpointgames.com",
   port = "5439",
   dbname = "datawarehouse",
   user = "acamps",
   password = "********"
)
dbListTables(spdb)
```
